record.field: T-shirt cotton Adult round neck L (MTS)

High Quality Cotton T-shirt available in the following variants:

Material: Crafted from 100% Ring-Spun Combed Cotton for superior softness and durability. Our t-shirts are pre-shrunk to ensure a consistent fit.

Fit:

  • Regular/Classic Fit: A standard, comfortable, and timeless fit.

  • Slim/Modern Fit: Tapered through the chest and waist for a more tailored look.

  • Relaxed/Oversized Fit: A looser, more casual fit that is currently popular in streetwear.

  • Athletic Fit: Designed to fit close to the body, often with raglan sleeves, to allow for movement

Neckline: 

  • Crew Neck (Round Neck): The most classic and popular style.

  • V-Neck: A "V" shaped neckline that can be shallow or deep.

  • Scoop Neck: A wider, U-shaped neckline, more common in women's styles.

  • Henley: A crew neck with a placket of a few buttons, often without a collar.

  • Polo Collar: A two-button placket and a soft, folded collar.

  • Boat Neck: A wide, straight neckline that runs horizontally across the collarbone.

Sleeve Cut:

  • Set-in Sleeve: The standard sleeve that is sewn into the armhole seam.

  • Raglan Sleeve: Extends in one piece to the collar, creating a diagonal seam.

  • Dolman/Batwing Sleeve: A very loose sleeve that gets narrower at the wrist.

Color: 

Black, White, Heather Gray, Navy Blue, Olive Green, Maroon, Royal Blue, Pastel Pink
